external_games.name: Agents of Mayhem - Safeword Agent Pack

name: Agents of Mayhem: Safeword Agent Pack
summary: If you can build it, she can hack it. Safeword has little patience for stupidity, even less for Legion. Assemble an army of cybersecurity experts, it doesn’t matter. The woman’s a walking infrastructure threat, and nothing—from your email password to your doomsday weapon—is safe.
